name: Dealzvan
tag_list: deal, dealz, deals, dealzvan, dealsvan, delhi-deals, spa-deals, health--beauty-deals, gym-deals, lunch-deals, dinner-deals, coffee-deals, company-offsite-deals, resort-deals, bowling-deals, car-deals
overview:
Dealzvan, is a venture of Alliance Online Retail Services, based on an e-commerce portal supporting group buying / collaborative buying, offers products and services at significantly reduced prices. Group Buying can be achieved when like minded group of consumers come together to avail discount, which would have been difficult to achieve had it been an individual.

Our customers get the best deals from the comfort of their homes/offices, while the business partners get the right marketing exposure and increased volume.

Dealzvan has tie-up with various establishments in your cities and brings the benefits of collective buying to the end customer.

Study of economics behind the retail industry trends reveal that an easy access to products and services like our website and a great customer experience, results in customer loyalty and repeat purchase. Based on above premise, we undertake to sell the discounted products and services, without minimum number of buyer’s as a pre-condition to sale. Our customer centric approach enables us to provide great discounts to our customers and provide high volume business and increased footfall to our partners. We take pride in linking target customers to the target partners.
